content.para: The 3.5.1 release of introduces a number of minor improvements and bug fixes.

td.p: In the it is now possible to export the current visualization image as PNG.
In the the "more like this" link is now also available in visualization views.

img.alt: Web application: 'more like this' in visualization view

tr.td: can now cluster search results produced by Autonomy IDOL. Please see the CARROT-801 comment for configuration details.

Following the discontinuation of the free access to Yahoo BOSS, support for Yahoo document sources has been removed from . If you'd like to have Yahoo BOSS back in , please add your vote or comment to CARROT-826.

content.p: For a complete list of improvements and bug fixes, see JIRA issues fixed in version 3.5.1. For more new features, please see release 3.5.0 and release 3.4.0 notes.
